title: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'git': 'git'
body:
| |_  _ __| |_ __ _(_)__ _
| | || / _` \ V  V / / _` |
|_|\_,_\__,_|\_/\_/|_\__, |
                     |___/
ludwig v0.1.0 - Train

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/bin/ludwig", line 10, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 86, in main
    CLI()
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 64, in __init__
    getattr(self, args.command)()
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 70, in train
    train.cli(sys.argv[2:])
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/train.py", line 663, in cli
    full_train(**vars(args))
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/train.py", line 192, in full_train
    random_seed
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/utils/misc.py", line 43, in get_experiment_description
    stdout=open(os.devnull, 'w')) == 0
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/subprocess.py", line 287, in call
    with Popen(*popenargs, **kwargs) as p:
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/subprocess.py", line 729, in __init__
    restore_signals, start_new_session)
  File "/home/gpu/.conda/envs/ludwig/lib/python3.6/subprocess.py", line 1364, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception_type(errno_num, err_msg, err_filename)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'git': 'git'
